page.title: 02Industry at Easons Green
page.content: This area has developed a small industrial estate due to the availability of land. Industry has expanded around a small business initiated by a local family who own all the surrounding land. This ownership imposes limitations on expansion of the estate. The trade is primarily concerned with retail distribution. This includes supplying tiles, steel frames, land drains, refrigerators and generators locally and nationally. Some firms use computer related technology to aid communication and administration. The workforce is small but employees originate from all parts of Britain. The general view from employees is that life here hasn't changed since the original Domesday Book, only technology and working methods!
